reviewText: A great compilation of the last 10 years of the Camel Trophy. I used to get the videos from the local dealers (with Scott Brady), a stare in wonder at what they accomplished with mostly stock rigs and a lot of labor. This DVD is a great introduction to the Trophy, although my complaint is that it's too short- I would have skipped the last couple years and lengthened the years when the driving was the focus.

I was glad to see this DVD released as it helps keep the legacy of the Camel Trophy alive.  My only complaint is that I wish it was twice as long...

Great footage of Series, Defender and Discovery Land Rovers in action from throughout the world.
